caption.p: (A) Sampling sites of A. retroflexus populations according to the Koppen–Geiger classification (1990–2014) ( Raziei, 2017). Numbers on map are population names based on Table 1. (B) Sampling sites of C. album populations according to the Koppen–Geiger classification (1990–2014) ( Raziei, 2017). Numbers on map are population names based on Table 1.
